extendedInfo.description: Halloween Candy Drop is a fun halloween themed game where you drop candy down a peg board. Halloween Candy Drop is fun, challenging, and addicting to play. Drag the candy at the top to where you want to release it and then click the "drop candy" button. The goal of the game is to get the highest score possible. You must get at least 150 points to unlock the next level. Some levels have objects that can effect the candy. Halloween Candy Drop is similar to Plinko which is a game on The Price Is Right. It is easy to play but hard to master.+ Fun Halloween theme+ Many obstacles like ghosts, bats and gummy bears+ 2 types of candy to drop (candy corn and round candy)+ Physics based game+ Fun for all ages

reviews.comment: I haven\'t been on long enough to really rate it being i\'m a newby overall its Okay.
reviews.author: Wilma Oliver

reviews.title: Bad Ads
reviews.comment: I don\'t mind ads in free games, but this one puts an ad in the middle of gameplay that keeps you from playing. Uninstalled after the ad remained even after restarting the game multiple times.
reviews.author: Tony Eldridge
